title: Jackie Adie
deck: Trev & I moved up from Birmingham to be a part of this church in 1984, we have 5 grown up children and enjoy spending time with them and our 8 grandchildren usually involving food! I have worked for our church since 1997 and since 2002 have been the CAP centre manager, a role I love as it enables me to offer practical help and support to people in our community showing them that we and God care about them.
words: A People with a Purpose in a Place
